name: Second Language Pedagogy
description: This course offers a comprehensive survey and analysis of fundamental concepts and issues related to second, bilingual, and foreign language instruction by developing students' knowledge of second language acquisition, approaches to language teaching, computer-assisted teaching, and pedagogical design and implementation in the language classroom. [24L]
prerequisites: LIN101H5, LIN102H5 (or LIN100Y5), plus 0.5 credit in LIN at the 300-level
